transcript.text:
￼


























Generative AI
Setup Google Gemini

6 min
overview and purpose google gemini is google’s next generation ai model designed to compete with advanced ai systems like openai's gpt 4 gemini combines the capabilities of large language models with cutting edge advancements in multimodal ai, allowing it to process and generate content across text, images, and other data formats integrating onprintshop with google gemini can greatly enhance the capabilities of print service providers by elevating customer support, automating content creation, and streamlining operations with advanced ai driven insights and solutions for generative ai implementation in your onprintshop store, we recommend using your paid gemini account you can check your account status from the "billing" section how to integrate 1 log in to your google ai studio account 1 log in to your google ai studio account go to the google ai studio site and log in to your account 2 2 get the api key get the api key to create the api key, click on the get api key available in the left panel on the api keys screen, click on the create api key button the secret key will generated you can copy and save the key in a secure place click on the done button 3 3 configuration in admin panel configuration in admin panel on your admin panel, go to the store configurations >> external service settings >> generative ai >> open ai >> 'edit’ option api key enter the api key copied in the above step model select the gemini model you want to use from the drop down once done, you can save all the details to utilize the gemini integration, follow the generate content and images using openai docid\ ay6htjgkoxs9bxnsn9qs4 guide
Did this page help you?
